content.rendered:
DC22 (Danfoss Drives Conference) is the largest drives customer and partner networking event organized by Danfoss, which was held last week in London.

Nikhil Mohan, Assistant Manager – Business Development & Sales represented Technical & Trading Est. (TTE) at DC22. It was the perfect platform to network with representatives from the industry and learn more about system optimization through CBM (condition-based monitoring), increasing uptime using DrivePro® services and finding out more about Danfoss VLT® &VACON® drives, amongst other interesting topics of discussion.
